data.name: Once Upon a Time... Life: Origins
data.detailed_description:
Once Upon a Time... Life : Origins
Dive into the world of a well-known franchise, Hello Maestro Once Upon a Time..., that taught an entire generation about the human body. Along the way you will meet many characters from the series and get the opportunity to help them out and learn from them.


Play in Co-op
Thanks to asymmetrical co-op, parents and children can discover the secrets of the human body together. Once Upon a Time... Life : Origins , while also fun for solo players, really starts to shine when two players cooperate in solving puzzles and helping out in various parts of the body.


Learn Through Fun
The adventure will take you to the different systems of the human body where you can learn how each of them work. During your journey, you will visit places like the respiratory system, the gastric system, and the nervous system.


Solve Puzzles and Face Challenges
A variety of puzzles will keep you entertained throughout the story. The game offers two kinds of puzzles – platforming challenges and logical riddles that are great fun to solve together or solo.

data.short_description: Once Upon a Time... Life is a 2D co-op platformer meant for children and parents. The game will lead you through various places inside the human body and let you discover the secrets of its inner workings in an easy and accessible way.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel i5 Quad-Core
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050, Radeon Pro 560 or similar
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4460 CPU @ 3.20 GHz
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB
